Package com.cs301w01.meatload.adapters

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlbumAdapter
    Adapter for populating a ListView with album names and picture counts of those albums.
    ComparePictureGalleryAdapter  
    GridViewGalleryAdapter
    Use this adapter when you want to create a vertical photo gallery that slides up and down.
    HorizontalGalleryAdapter
    Used in conjunction with a view to create a timeline of pictures built from the paths given in the pictures array passed in the constructor.
    SimpleTagAdapter
    Special TagAdapter used with the AutoCompleteTextView in EditPictureActivity.
    SpinnerAlbumAdapter
    Adapter for the Spinner Album View in EditPictureActivity that takes a TextView as its view rather than a LinearLayout.
    TagAdapter
    Adapter for populating a ListView with tag names.
